page.title: 04KEYWORDS (Contd.)
page.content:
{HOME LIFE: Family care,home baking and preservation,with convenience foods a poor second to home cooked meals.
{HOUSING: Three farmsteads,two smallholdings,two private houses (one converted from a barn),all owner occupied. One cottage,one hotel with eight tied workers' cottages owned by the N.E. Co-operative Society.
All houses have mains electricity and with the exception of a smallholding and both private houses,mains water. Sewerage disposal in all cases is to septic tanks.The cottage has neither a bathroom or a flush toilet.
